summary: The document is a segment from the John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection, detailing a National Agency Check (NAC) conducted on Manuel Marti, a DOD-affiliated individual. It outlines Marti's personal details and the procedure for requesting further investigation if necessary. Initially classified, the document has been made public with certain redactions and is now considered unclassified.
key_findings: Part of the JFK Assassination Records Collection.
Describes a National Agency Check (NAC) performed on Manuel Marti.
Transitioned from classified to unclassified status with some information redacted.
Provides guidance on how to initiate additional investigative requests.
